plugins.name: MenuInspector
plugins.description: (开发工具) 显示当前右键菜单相关信息
plugins.author: MicroBlock

plugins.name: better-terminal
plugins.description: 增加管理员方式打开终端
plugins.author: Enlysure

plugins.name: 常用功能小图标 - Copy paste etc. in one line
plugins.description: 将复制，剪切等常用功能按钮添加到右键菜单的第一行小图标
plugins.author: MicroBlock
plugins.local_path: 常用功能小图标 - Copy paste etc. in one line.js

plugins.name: 右键菜单清理 - Context Menu Cleaner
plugins.description: 多功能、可配置的右键菜单清理工具 / A versatile and configurable context menu cleaner
plugins.author: MicroBlock
plugins.local_path: 右键菜单清理 - Context Menu Cleaner.js

plugins.name: 复制文件路径 Pro
plugins.description: 复制文件路径，文件名，拓展名，多个文件路径...
plugins.author: MicroBlock

plugins.name: Windows 11 Icon Pack
plugins.description: 给右键菜单换上 Windows 11 风格的图标 / Change the right-click menu to Windows 11 style icons
plugins.author: Unknown

plugins.name: 桌面右键配置 Breeze
plugins.description: 在桌面右键菜单添加“配置 Breeze”选项，点击后打开 Breeze 数据目录
plugins.author: leafmoes

plugins.name: 链接详情显示
plugins.description: 显示当前选中文件(夹)的链接详情（支持软链接、硬链接、符号链接）。点击路径可以直接复制。
plugins.author: NahidaBuer

shell.changelog:
### 中文
- ci: 在 Release 构建中删除调试信息
- fix: 为 NtUserTrackHook 使用精确类型
- fix: 更好的 Win11 右键菜单补丁定位方式
- refactor: 使用自己的调用栈获取实现
- fix: 在主线程执行改变大小事件
- fix: 在改变大小后清除一次窗口内容
- refactor: 不再在其它线程执行 JS 相关代码，改善多线程问题
- chore: 关闭 quickjs 的 pdb 生成
- feat: 实现一些 JavaScript API
  - `fs.isdir` #143  @leafmoes
  - `win32.load_file_icon`
  - `infra.atob` `infra.btoa`
  - `copy_shfile` `move_shfile`
  - `folder_view.select` 等
- fix: 使 submenu 添加函数阻塞执行
- fix: 在主线程上执行刷新操作
- fix: 修复一些崩溃问题

### English
- ci: Remove debug information in Release builds
- fix: Use precise types for NtUserTrackHook
- fix: Better positioning method for Win11 right-click menu patch
- refactor: Use our own implementation for call stack retrieval
- fix: Execute resize events on the main thread
- fix: Clear window content once after resizing
- refactor: No longer execute JS-related code on other threads to improve multi-threading issues
- chore: Disable pdb generation for quickjs
- feat: Implement some JavaScript APIs
  - `fs.isdir`
  - `win32.load_file_icon`
  - `infra.atob` `infra.btoa`
  - `copy_shfile` `move_shfile`
  - `folder_view.select`, etc.
- fix: Make submenu add function block execution
- fix: Execute refresh operations on the main thread
- fix: Fix some crash issues
